fields.name: AdministratorCredentials
fields.description: The credentials of the administrative interface on this storage appliance.

fields.name: Capacity
fields.description: The total capacity of the storage appliance.

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.description: The resource ID of the cluster this storage appliance is associated with.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The detailed status of the storage appliance.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: ManagementIPv4Address
fields.description: The endpoint for the management interface of the storage appliance.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the storage appliance.

fields.name: RackId
fields.description: The resource ID of the rack where this storage appliance resides.

fields.name: RackSlot
fields.description: The slot the storage appliance is in the rack based on the BOM configuration.

fields.name: RemoteVendorManagementFeature
fields.description: The indicator of whether the storage appliance supports remote vendor management.

fields.name: RemoteVendorManagementStatus
fields.description: The indicator of whether the remote vendor management feature is enabled or disabled, or unsupported if it is an unsupported feature.

fields.name: SerialNumber
fields.description: The serial number for the storage appliance.

fields.name: StorageApplianceSkuId
fields.description: The SKU for the storage appliance.
